TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時刪除 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Delete") 控制項內按一下時，但之後控制項刪除資料錄。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the control deletes the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查刪除作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理常式。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要判斷受影響的刪除作業記錄的數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of records affected by the delete operation, use the property. 使用屬性來判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式設定屬性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 如果您想要存取非索引鍵欄位的已刪除的記錄與索引鍵欄位的名稱/值組，使用和屬性，分別。If you want to access the name/value pairs of the key fields and non-key fields of the deleted record, use the and properties, respectively. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件傳遞至事件處理常式事件，以判斷是否刪除作業期間發生例外狀況。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event handler for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/CS/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/VB/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 參數的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||中包含`e`參數。The contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化為`false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 引發事件時主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

span.span: The number of rows affected by the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以判斷刪除作業所影響的資料列數目。Use the property to determine the number of rows affected by the delete operation. 這個值通常用於確認適當數目的資料列已刪除。This value is commonly used to verify that the appropriate number of rows was deleted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷受影響的刪除作業記錄的數目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of records affected by a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/CS/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/VB/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得刪除作業中引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the delete operation.

value.span: ，表示刪除作業中引發的例外狀況。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was raised during the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷例外狀況 （如果有的話），刪除作業中引發。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the delete operation. 如果沒有引發例外狀況，這個屬性會傳回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引發例外狀況，而且您決定要處理的例外狀況的事件處理常式，請務必設定屬性`true`; 否則例外狀況會傳遞給下一個方法的呼叫堆疊上供處理。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否刪除作業期間發生例外狀況。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/CS/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/VB/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否在事件處理常式中處理刪除作業中引發的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the delete operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果例外狀況在事件處理常式中已經過處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當刪除作業中引發例外狀況時，使用屬性，指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式。When an exception is raised during the delete operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，例外狀況處理，而且不會在呼叫堆疊進一步向上視為。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not passed further up the call stack. 如果這個屬性設定為`false`，例外狀況會傳遞給下一個方法的呼叫堆疊上供處理。If this property is set to `false`, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. 若要判斷引發的例外狀況，請使用屬性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來表示，已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/CS/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/VB/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的排序字典，其中包含已刪除項目之索引鍵欄位的名稱和值。

span.span: Gets an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs that contains the names and values of the key fields of the deleted items.

value.span: ，包含用來比對要刪除項目之索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的排序字典。

span.span: An that contains an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs used to match the item to delete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取以刪除記錄的索引鍵欄位的值。Use the property to access the values of the key fields for the record to delete. 例如，您可以使用這些值保存已刪除的記錄檔。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 此屬性包含索引鍵的欄位。This property contains only the key fields. 若要存取非索引鍵欄位，請使用屬性。To access the non-key fields, use the property. 屬性會傳回該物件會實作介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含代表要刪除之記錄的索引鍵欄位的物件。The object contains objects that represent the key fields of the record to delete. > [!NOTE] > 快速的方式，您也可以使用的索引子物件來存取該欄位值直接。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取已刪除的記錄的索引鍵欄位的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the key fields for a deleted record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/CS/detailsviewdeletedeventargskeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/VB/detailsviewdeletedeventargskeysvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得要刪除項目中非索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the item to delete.

value.span: ，包含要刪除之項目中非索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的字典。

span.span: A that contains a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the item to delete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取非索引鍵欄位，以刪除記錄的值。Use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for the record to delete. 例如，您可以使用這些值保存已刪除的記錄檔。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不包含記錄的索引鍵欄位。This property does not contain the key fields for the record. 若要存取的索引鍵欄位，請使用屬性。To access the key fields, use the property. 屬性會傳回實作物件介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含代表要刪除之記錄的非索引鍵欄位的物件。The object contains objects that represent the non-key fields of the record to delete. > [!NOTE] > 快速的方式，您也可以使用的索引子物件來存取該欄位值直接。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取已刪除的資料錄的非索引鍵欄位的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the non-key fields of a deleted record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/CS/detailsviewdeletedeventargskeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/VB/detailsviewdeletedeventargskeysvb.aspx#1)]
